typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Date as string,
		NewPositive as integer '###.###',
		NotPrevPos as string,
		PosPct as string,
		PrevPos as string,
		Tested as string,
		Tested_kumulativ as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 filter(like(Date,'%-%')) ~> Filter1
Filter1 derive(Date = toDate(Date,'yyyy-MM-dd'),
		PosPct = toDouble(PosPct,'###,#','de')) ~> ModifyColumns1
ModifyColumns1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
